root: ^Andreas, who is this Xenia and where did she come from?
^She is a tourist who was late for the ferry.
^I see. How did you find out about this maze?
^The same. He found this maze when he was young and then invited your father to join him as a specialist on ancient Greece. But they decided that it was too dangerous to study this place.
^But we are not so easily scared! We're still going forward, right?
